text: GCMS may refer to: * Gas chromatography–mass spectrometry, an analytical method to identify different substances within a test sample * Gibson City- Melvin-Sibley Community Unit School District 5, a K-12 public school district based in Gibson City, Illinois * Global Case Management System is a software system used by Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) to process immigration and citizenship applications. Information extracted from this software system is often referred to as GCMS Notes. *
title: GCMS
